docs.lead_paragraph: BOSTON, March 20. -- Accused of killing Rear Admiral Joseph G. Eaton with arsenical poison, Mrs. Jennie May Harrison Eaton, his widow, 45 years old, was arrested to-day by Plymouth County officials. She was held without ball for a hearing on March 28. It was intimated to-night that Mrs. Eaton might not be placed on trial.

headline.main: ADMIRAL'S WIDOW IN CELL AS SLAYER; Mrs. Eaton Leaves Home Thinking She Is a Witness, and Is Charged with Murder.

docs.abstract: wife is arrested, may be examined for insanity, her family history
